relation: rewrite of bouncing to include time parameter in the bouncing algorythm + extra settings: ball_interacts, ball_kills, ball_team_mode
Zone to give points to the first players to reach it
A zone in which the player tail is erased
Command to interact with zones from console/script
Command to spawn an explosion from console/script
Command to respawn a player from console/script
Command to grant points to team/player from script
several settings to control players joining a game
Extra messages to send information to script via edlog file
send a COMMAND entry to the script
Separate log file for chat to allow a view on the server action from a webpage
The goal was to give some control over bots to be able to create single player games
generate and SVG image of the current game play.
textBeforeTable: the extra features are : To merge features of Armahacktron back into the main armagetron repository (at LINK launchpad.net). CT_voodoo and [User:joda.bot] created this feature list. The list also contains actions to be taken for each feature. If we missed a feature or you think the feature should go to another branch. Please correct the information here. Features So, what can I actually do with it? Running a Server edlog.txt. The additional log file written to by the server. Give lots of extra information. To be read by a script to do all sorts of wonderful things. Edlog Extra settings that have been added The ability to spawn/collape/move/resize zones, either via the console or script. Settings An older source code with sample tables and scripts can be Downloaded here bzr up To update the code move to the 0.2.8-armagetronad-sty+ct directory and use the following  bzr co http://bazaar.launchpad.net/~armagetronad-ct/armagetronad/0.2.8-armagetronad-sty+ct Our current source code is on BZR (bzr >= 1.0)   Source This place is dedicated to trying to document the hacks that have been done to Armagetron Advanced.  Groundpig started it all off with his hacks that included shooting, zombies, styball and capture the Flag.
textAfterTable: Goal: Add Links or short descriptions to each feature. Possible Target? branches are general feature/"bug fix" goes to arma, styball related to styball, all others to CT branch (which will probably be a styball subbranch). Currently voodoo is working on gWinzone, while joda.bot is working on merging ePlayer and eTeam.
